summary: Most onboarding flow pages/routes and vendor discovery are implemented (Home landing, customer/vendor login forms, vendor list filtering by city, view-shop route, outlet details with image preview, and a simple vendor dashboard). However, there is insufficient diff evidence that the City dropdown is restricted to exactly Kanpur/Unnao, and the global theme palette includes blue/purple despite the non-blue/non-purple palette requirement. Additionally, several existing non-Home storefront/admin/vendor pages were restyled beyond the requested scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Customer Login Form: City dropdown limited to exactly Kanpur, Unnao (and validation).
missing_requirements.reason: CustomerLoginPage.tsx is truncated before the City <SelectItem> options; the diff summary does not show the dropdown options, so it cannot be verified that the options are exactly Kanpur and Unnao.

missing_requirements.requirement: Vendor Login Form: City dropdown limited to exactly Kanpur, Unnao (and validation).
missing_requirements.reason: VendorLoginPage.tsx is truncated before the City <SelectItem> options; the diff summary does not show the dropdown options, so it cannot be verified that the options are exactly Kanpur and Unnao.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use a coherent non-blue/non-purple palette across the new onboarding flow screens.
missing_requirements.reason: Global CSS variables explicitly define a blue secondary and include a purple chart color (and related info color). This contradicts the non-blue/non-purple palette constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Restyling/redesign of existing admin pages (dashboard/products/vendors/orders) beyond the requested onboarding flow and Home replacement.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goal says not to redesign/remove existing storefront/cart/checkout functionality beyond replacing the Home page content; diff summaries indicate additional styling/CTA changes across admin pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Restyling of existing storefront/cart/checkout/product pages and shared components beyond replacing the Home page content.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal restricts changes to existing storefront/cart/checkout beyond replacing Home content, but summaries show visual/theme changes to CartPage, CheckoutPage, ProductPage, ProductGrid, etc.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new shared PrimaryCtaButton component and applied it across existing pages (admin/vendor/customer profile flows).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; indicates broader UI refactor beyond onboarding flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified shared status styling utilities (OrderStatusBadge/statusStyles) affecting existing vendor/admin orders pages.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in onboarding requirements; indicates unrelated enhancements.
